column5: Gonna be a good one... Avery is heading up to Kesagami to work for the season and we have a 5 night trip booked up there as well, with one day on the outpost lake as well.  I can't wait!  Got myself a 12 foot tinny on a trailer with a 2.5 hp brand new Yamaha so Monique and I can start exploring all the great little gems we've found while 4-wheeling around Jiggy.  We're planning on a ton of videos to support the new store.  Cant believe my boy is off to work in the bush ...  he'll be right at home!!    Man...  im sick of plowing the driveway.
Congrats to Avery.  The little boy becomes a man  Can't wait to see the videos TJ.  You guys have will have a great summer
Nice can't wait for those vids and reports. Lucky little fellow drivin already.

He will have a blast at the Lodge TJ, by far one of the best summers in my life was spent up there! Looks like you have a fun summer ahead of you TJ. I have a little cottage booked for the week mr largemouth season opens up and then the annual camping trip in August! Can't wait!  Enjoy the rest of winter  MTBF
Nice! You got any lakes up there with whities? LOL
Congrats to Avery on landing the dream job TJ, he'll have a ball.  Lookin forward to your Jiggy reports too, as always.

Yup Cant wait.. this is the third time to Kesagami and gonna be the longest..  I'm hoping Avery enjoys his time up there, big change from Ottawa... Funny thing is hes got a couple of weeks to hang out before he leaves and all he wants to do is go to camp. lol  Chris... not much a a whitie fisherman. so im not sure!
Lol, well thats what you are this year!
Congrats to Avery, I;m sure he'll have a great summer, along with the rest of you!!!  Looking forward to the Jiggy reports  Maureen
